```{r}
data <- read.csv('./data.5.csv')
clean <- data[,-1]
clean$Treatment <- factor(clean$Treatment, labels = c("Treated", "Placebo"))
clean$Improved <- factor(clean$Improved, labels = c("Yes", "No"))

clean_chi <- chisq.test(clean$Treatment, clean$Improved)
```
